creator: CodezTalk
descriptionHtml:
Assalamu alaikum,

The application of the Holy Qur’an in the voice of Abdulrahman Aloosi allows you to hear all the surahs of the Holy Qur’an through your mobile phone or tablet with ease through one program that contains all the surahs of the Holy Qur’an. Android. The Holy Quran application can be downloaded with the voice of Abdulrahman Aloosi with ease, so that you can enjoy the recitation of the Holy Quran in the voice of Sheikh Abdulrahman Aloosi wherever you want.

* Why does the user need to install the application to download the Holy Quran in the voice of Abdulrahman Aloosi ?

If you want your mobile phone or tablet to be filled with the remembrance of God, and if you love to listen to Sheikh Abdulrahman Aloosi in the recitation of the Qur’an.

You will not need to pay money to buy the application, and after you install the application easily from the store, you will be able to listen to the Holy Quran with the voice of Sheikh Abdulrahman Aloosi simply.

The interface of the Holy Qur’an program with the voice of Abdulrahman Aloosi is very simple, which enables you to use the program with ease. You will not suffer any difficulty starting from downloading the program from the store until the download of the Holy Quran program in the voice of Abdulrahman Aloosi , and using it to listen to the surahs of the Holy Quran.
After downloading the application, you can listen to the surahs of the Holy Quran with the voice of Sheikh Abdulrahman Aloosi for free anytime and anywhere with ease.

* Features of the application of the Holy Qur’an Abdulrahman Aloosi

Now you can use the application with ease and listen to the surahs of the Holy Qur’an in the voice of Sheikh Abdulrahman Aloosi and live a wonderful state of faith in which you delve into the meanings of the Holy Qur’an, enjoying the voice of Sheikh Abdulrahman Aloosi that transports you to another world with his distinctive voice.
Do not hesitate and download the application now and enjoy a different faith experience with the application of the Holy Qur’an in the voice of Abdulrahman Aloosi .

You can share the program link with your friends on various social media so that they can benefit from the Holy Quran program in the voice of Abdulrahman Aloosi and enjoy its features, the most important of which is that it is a simple free application that fits with all phones, occupying a simple area of ​​the device.
And if you love listening to the Holy Quran with the voice of Sheikh Muhammad Al-Tablawi, Sheikh Abdul Basit Abdul-Samad, Sheikh Khalil Al-Hosari and other constellations of sheikhs, or if you want to learn the rules of intonation or get to know the strongest sound Sharia paper, do not hesitate to take a look at the rest of our applications on the store Available to users for free and easy.

✔ In the end, if you like the application to download the Holy Qur’an with the voice of Abdulrahman Aloosi , do not hesitate to evaluate the program and our other programs that you liked and share your opinion with us because your opinion is always our goal.
✔ You can evaluate the program to download the Holy Qur’an with the voice of Abdulrahman Aloosi for free mp3 through the option (application evaluation) in the application itself, and we will be very happy with that.

title: Abdulrhman Alosi Quran Offline

creator: CodezTalk
descriptionHtml:
The application of the Holy Qur’an with the voice of the reciter Abdul'rahman Ben Gamal al Ausi allows you to hear all the surahs of the Holy Qur’an through your phone or tablet with ease and ease through one application that contains all the surahs of the Holy Qur’an without the Internet. Fans of listening to the reader Abdul'rahman Ben Gamal al Ausi , you will not need to pay money to download the application.
Also, the application interface is very simple, which enables you to use it with ease and ease. You will not suffer any difficulty, starting from downloading the application from the store, until it is downloaded to your phone, and using it to listen to the entire surah of the Noble Qur’an without the Internet.


characteristics of the application of the Noble Qur’an with the voice of the reciter Abdul'rahman Ben Gamal al Ausi :-

- Ease of use of the application due to the abundance of its features.
- Easy to navigate between sections of the application without any problems, and the application has the speed to respond to commands.
- The application is also characterized by being free and available on the store for Android phones.
- Recite the surah sequentially or randomly.
- Headphone support.
- The possibility of changing the playback speed.
- The ability to skip forward or backward within 10 seconds.
- The ability to present the surah by clicking on the progress bar.
- The ability to run the application in the background.
- You can play Sarah and continue browsing your phone without having to continue opening the application.
descriptionShort: The Quraan with the voice of reciter Abdul'rahman Gamal alAusi without Internet
